thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 97 of 7354
thread.title: Phil

author: Phil
title: Phil
text: I've been with B & H sporadically over the years as my photography and illustration demands have grown and changed. I've never had a bad experience either from direct ordering or from speaking with a customer service associate about a concern. Also, B & H has the best prices around on the all the lenses, paper, printers and lights I used for my business. Excellent company all around.
